overview: Based on extensive research into early childhood development, Bubbly Bubs captures the interest and attention of its young viewers and helps them easily learn simple songs.  This Bubbly Bubs video is a special compilation of babies and toddlers enjoying themselves as only they can.  The images are linked to specially arranged music accompanying well known nursery rhymes.  Give yourself a break as Bubbly Bubs entertains and calms your child.
tagline: The video that makes your baby happy.
title: Bubbly Bubs
